评论详情: I could wear these shorts EVERYDAY, I love them ! They do fit a little on the larger side, but I’m thankful because they’re so comfortable and not constricting in the slightest. To make them even better, they’re flattering especially on shorter frames. My 26” inseam legs look long and long in these babies! I’m way happy with them and am anticipating which color to buy next. A Carhartt brown would be a nice color to make; hint, hint… ;)
True to size fit. I am 5’10. 155 lbs. I got my true size large! The color is beautiful and comes in several options I love the high waisted fit!
Great heavy quality, super soft, but definitely long! And super high waisted. They’ll make great pajama shorts but I could never wear them out

I like that these shorts are a thinner cotton (like a thin sweatshirt) and not the typical athletic material or sweatshirt material that’s too thick. I hate wearing shorts but I live in FL so getting dressed during the hot months is especially challenging. These shorts are really comfortable. They wash well too - delicate cycle, low heat and didn’t shrink much (if at all). I sized up one size so they were baggy but if you want them to hit closer to your body, I think they run TTS. (For reference, I’m 5’3”, 145lbs, pear shaped size 4/6 curvy in pants and I prefer the Large in these). Overall a great buy! I have at least 4 colors now.
Opened and put them on and they felt great and was excited but the side seam isn’t together, looks like it was missed in finishing up the sewing’s
5'6", 138 lbs. Bought a small. Fit great in the waist. A bit looser and longer than expected but super cute and comfy.

评论概述: Perfect for more junk in the trunk girls
评论详情: When I got these in the mail I immediately ordered the in 2 more colors. I struggle with soft shorts and them always riding up in the back & not being long enough to cover everything. These are perfect for all body types! They’re stretchy & thick yet very lightweight! Definitely recommend!

These are thin but fleece lined lightly on the inside and they are pricey but they are good quality made very well very good brand. I can tell they are going to last a long time. I ordered a small and I’m a 4-6 pants size and they do fit perfectly I’m going to try ordering a medium next time.
They are too high wasted for my liking and kind of ride up and dig into the crotch area. I like the ododos sweat shorts better

评论概述: Perfect for a cozy lounge short or very casual athleisure, not so much for an actual workout
评论详情: These are a sweatshort, not workout shorts…which is what I was looking for so it works for me.  To me, they scream lounge:  These feel like something I’d put on at the end of the day in that weird in-between time before bed, or maybe on a lazy Sunday.  You can definitely wear them in a casual athleisure look without looking *too* too sloppy.Shorts are solid quality and the fabric has some weight to it.  These are made of a sweatshirt-type material—a medium-weight cotton-like fabric that I would not want to sweat in. (They aren’t breathable and there is no liner, so I wouldn’t workout in them.  But those aspects make them good for lounge for me.)  A pocket on each side, wide elastic waistband, and volley-style hem.  The inseam is about 2” *but* they do hang longer and cover more than that in the way they comfortably fall on me, which is the waistband at or just below my natural waist.  I could hike them up all the way to my bra if I wanted the actual 2” length…but that’s not comfortable and would look silly.Drawstring works but note—they are not super tight anywhere.  I suppose I could cinch up the drawstring, but then I’d have an unusually long string hanging on the front.  I got my true size (XS, 5’3”, 110lb) and they work…a bit loose, but that works for my lounge purposes.  If you want a tighter fit, size down.Overall good for my purpose!  One star down just for the slightly extra loose fit and slightly odd length/extra fabric around the crotch.
I wear these shorts as lounge shorts because they are so comfy
Very comfortable. My new favorite lounging shorts
Very soft and looks great!
They are ok - nice material and comfortable- but they do ride up, just fyi.

I was looking for sweatshorts and like CRZ Yoga so I ordered these. I liked them overall! They are soft brushed buttery material and the Small fit me great! (I'm 5'3", 125lb) They came to a good length, no butt cheek showed and they weren't too long to where they weren't flattering. They were a little see-through, as are any white/off-white short but it wasn't bad at all..nude underwear would work great. But overall, I just didn't want to spend $28 on a pair of shorts that weren't really the sweatshort style I was hoping for, so ultimately I did return them. But if you're looking for dolphin hem lounge shorts that are soft, definitely try them out!

These shorts are very comfortable and sizing is good. I'm 5'5" and around 130 lbs. The medium size fits me well. I wish they were a little lighter weight, but I like them enough to order more. It's hard to find all cotton shorts, so I'm glad I found these.
This is my second pair of shorts! They are so comfortable, true to size and look great in comfort or on the go. The color options are great too!
These shorts are super soft. I wish they were a little shorter for my liking and a wider waste band. They are great for lounging around or if you have longer legs.
I bought 3 pair and LOVE every single pair. They’re so soft and comfortable!! True to size!

These are my new go to comfy shorts. They're cute enough I can wear them out to errands or could probably wear to the gym. They definitely stretch out a little as you wear them which can be good or bad depending on your preference. I would definitely buy again in more colors.
I love the feel, fit, and comfort.
super cute, super comfortable!
Product run bigger than expected. I recommend sizing down
I was expecting and hoping for a thicker material. I liked the style and coverage. Ultimately I returned the item because the fabric was thin and wasn't worth the price.
These are perfect so I bought 3 colors. Definitely happy with purchase
Bought these and love them! Super comfortable. I bought them for my daughter too. Size up for a perfect fit.
I was surprised these are better quality than I expected! I will be ordering more colors

I'm loving my CRZ YOGA Women's Casual Sweat Shorts in White Apricot, size Small! They're incredibly comfy, thanks to the soft cotton fabric and a flexible fit. The pockets are a game-changer, allowing me to carry essentials hassle-free during workouts or lounging. The White Apricot color is stylish and versatile, easily matching different outfits. Plus, these shorts maintain their quality even after multiple washes. I'm impressed and definitely recommend them for anyone seeking comfort and style in one package.
These are slightly too long and high waisted for my taste and I like high waisted things but look awkward. I just rolled them once and they are perfect and comfortable.
I like these a lot. They are super comfortable and fit really well.
Comfortable shorts , great value . Bought in several colors

These are sooo soft and comfy! Love these. Ordering more colors (really wish they had a mocha color!). I am 5'9, 148lbs, size 28/6 bottoms and I love the way the mediums fit me. High rise and cover the butt, not too tight in the waist. Can wear out or lounge in. Washed and wore well. A bit sheer in the white color
I’m 5’2” 115lbs and got a small and they fit great to lounge around. They’re comfy without being annoyingly tight around the waist
Nice, soft shorts, perfect for lounge clothes but there nothing flattering about them way too baggy.
These are my go to shorts this summer. So comfy and great material. Not see through and the pockets are great. They have a drawstring to tighten if needed

These shorts are nice quality, the perfect amount of softness for everyday wear, and fit great—even two months postpartum with my second baby. I’m already looking at the other colors for my second pair.
I actually liked the material, but not the fit on my body.

评论概述: Nice material but not a flattering fit
评论详情: I like the feel of the material but the size definitely runs bigger than expected and is not a flattering fit. Really wanted to love these but will be returning them.
Love these shorts for lounging, working out, or wearing out for errands. Would not recommend these as running shorts but for every other purpose they are great!
I love these shorts! They fit and wash up great. They are lightweight and feel like a thin sweet pant material.
Such a good pair of shorts to lounge or run around town! Will order other colors!
Travis was too thick and not a great fit. Runs big.
I love these shorts. They have become my absolute favorite lounge shorts. I will be getting them in the other colors. Super soft and comfortable.
These shorts are the perfect sweat shorts! The material is so soft. I’m 5’3 140lbs ordered a small and they fit perfectly.
Get these.
This cream color is see through when you are outside!
These are super soft and stretchy, but they don’t give you any definition. It felt like wearing sweatpants but as shorts and that isn’t what I was looking for.
Returned. They are very sheer even with sizing up for a looser fit.

Really like these high rise shorts with pockets. The waistband sits smooth and is comfortable. I’d say they’re true to size in the waist but a little large in the legs/butt. They aren’t super flattering in my opinion, but they’re super comfortable. Thick jersey sweatpants material. I wouldn’t wear these to the gym, but I like them for around the house and sleep. These are much more a lounge short than an exercise short. I was hoping they’d be more athletic looking and feeling, but they make comfy short. I do like the length and that they don’t bunch up in the middle when I walk.

I really questioned how well these would fit when I ordered them, but they fit nicely and are so comfortableto wear. I've definitely found my new go to apparel for lounging around the house/yard as I try to survive the summer heat and humidity of East Texas. I'd definitely recommend these shorts to others and will probably be adding a couple more pairs to my wardrobe.

When I pulled them out of the box I thought for sure they wouldn’t fit. They looked so small. I’m between a 10 and a 12. I pulled them on and boy was I wrong. They fit perfectly with zero muffin top. The fabric is soft and they don’t scoop too high up the hips. They wear well and don’t ride up.

I love the brand crz yoga leggings so I decided to try the shorts. I am very happy with the shorts. They are soft and stayed in place. Waist band is comfortable and not scratchy. Even comfortable enough for me that I also wore them to sleep in. I would recommend these shorts!

Este short esta diseñado bellamente, costuras perfectas, no hilos salidos, la tela es de excelente calidad, medidas exactas, yo peso 117 libras y la talla XS me quedo perfecto, cubre decentemente Es súper cómodo, muy suave y muy fresco Simplemente perfecto

评论概述: Dupe for lululemon inner glow shorts
评论详情: These are just as comfortable and high quality as lululemon inner glow shorts. The fabric is a little thinner with more stretch which I like (and think is more flattering). There is a bit more coverage in the back compared to lulu. I wear a 6 and ordered a medium. True to size and amazing for the price!

These shorts are awesome. The cut of them makes my legs look longer than they are through the dolphin hem. The material is a stretchy-soft terry fabric. They are comfortable for staying in or going out.
Absolutely love these shorts. I’m 5’7, 158 lbs. I have long legs and carry my extra weight in my  thighs and butt. I ordered a size large and LOVE them.
Super soft and comfortable material. True size. Good quality.

评论概述: Super soft shorts for workouts, lounging, or sleeping in
评论详情: I bought these shorts for my daughter in college.  They are super soft and wash great.  She wears them to the gym to workout and lounges around the dorms in them. They are so soft she even sleeps in them.  We will definitely be buying them in additional colors.
Love these shorts to lay around the house in. Super comfy and plan on ordering another color! True to my normal size small
